Project Description
A free karate semaphore (scoreboard) conforming to the new 2012 WKF rules.

Implemented using C# and WPF and the MVVM pattern.



Contributions
  • Video Trailer

New in Karate Semaphore 1.2.0.0
  • Display of arbitrary competitor related text (e.g. competitor name, club, country, ...)

Features
  • Fullscreen display window
  • Separate controller window with display preview
  • Simple controller keyboard shortcuts
  • Unlimited undo & redo steps in the controller window, with verbose descriptions
  • Custom countdown time
  • 2012 WKF rules
  • Automatic online update using Click Once
  • Adjustable scoreboard and controller orientation (just click on the scoreboard to change)

Roadmap
  • Additional content on the scoreboard display (e.g. competitor names, ...)
  • Keyboard shortcut customization
  • GUI localization
  • Scoreboard display templating support
  • Customizable rules
  • Scoreboard mask display (that can be shown when editing data between matches)

Requirements
  • .NET Framework 4 Client Profile (http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=17113)
